text: Egha me uan suren gumazir maba ko Herotɨn gɨn zuir darazi amada, ezɨ me Iesus bagha ghua kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisa, e fo nɨ guizbangɨra bizibav geir gumazim. Nɨ Godɨn Arazibar gumazibar sure gamuava guizbangɨra me mɨgei. Nɨ tavɨn nɨghnɨzimɨn gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Akar vamɨra nɨ gumazir ziaba itiba, ko gumazir kɨniba uaghara, me mɨgei.
